title: Not allowed to switch champs with another player in queue with new client
body:
Just had to ff a match because i was playing ap trundle, due to not having the buthton to switch champion in selection.

Me and the random player both said it was not by their name.

replies.body: Are you sure they had the correct champion to switch with you? I have seen the switch button everytime so far afaik at least when I know the person I am playing with has the champ.
